verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>! it is all <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%> and <S%H6563>robbery<s%>; the <S%H2964>prey<s%> <S%H4185>departeth<s%> not;

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H7752>whip<s%>, and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%>, and of the <S%H1725>pransing<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and of the <S%H7540>jumping<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%>.

The <S%H6571>horseman<s%> lifteth <S%H5927>up<s%> both the <S%H3851>bright<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> and the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%>: and there is a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2491>slain<s%>, and a <S%H3514>great<s%> number of <S%H6297>carcases<s%>; and there is none <S%H7097>end<s%> of their <S%H1472>corpses<s%>; they <S%H3782%H3782>stumble<s%> upon their <S%H1472>corpses<s%>:

Because of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of the <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> of the <S%H2896%H2580>wellfavoured<s%> <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%>, that <S%H4376>selleth<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> through her <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%>, and <S%H4940>families<s%> through her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%>.

Behold, I am against thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and I will <S%H1540>discover<s%> thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> upon thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, and I will <S%H7200>shew<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> thy <S%H4626>nakedness<s%>, and the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> thy <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
And I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> abominable <S%H8251>filth<s%> upon thee, and make thee <S%H5034>vile<s%>, and will <S%H7760>set<s%> thee as a <S%H7210>gazingstock<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that all they that <S%H7200>look<s%> upon thee shall <S%H5074>flee<s%> from thee, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>: who will <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> her? <S%H370>whence<s%> shall I <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> for thee?

Art thou <S%H3190>better<s%> than <S%H527%H528>populous<s%> <S%H4996>No<s%>, that was <S%H3427>situate<s%> among the <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, that had the <S%H4325>waters<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> it, whose <S%H2426>rampart<s%> was the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and her <S%H2346>wall<s%> was from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>?
<S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were her <S%H6109>strength<s%>, and it was <S%H369%H7097>infinite<s%>; <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> were thy <S%H5833>helpers<s%>.

Yet was she carried <S%H1473>away<s%>, she <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>: her young <S%H5768>children<s%> also were dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> at the <S%H7218>top<s%> of all the <S%H2351>streets<s%>: and they <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for her honourable <S%H3513>men<s%>, and all her great <S%H1419>men<s%> were <S%H7576>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>chains<s%>.
Thou also shalt be <S%H7937>drunken<s%>: thou shalt be <S%H5956>hid<s%>, thou also shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4581>strength<s%> because of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.

All thy strong <S%H4013>holds<s%> shall be like fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> with the firstripe <S%H1061>figs<s%>: if they be <S%H5128>shaken<s%>, they shall even <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H398>eater<s%>.

Behold, thy <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee are <S%H802>women<s%>: the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> shall be set <S%H6605>wide<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thy <S%H1280>bars<s%>.

<S%H7579>Draw<s%> thee <S%H4325>waters<s%> for the <S%H4692>siege<s%>, <S%H2388>fortify<s%> thy strong <S%H4013>holds<s%>: <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H2916>clay<s%>, and <S%H7429>tread<s%> the <S%H2563>morter<s%>, make <S%H2388>strong<s%> the <S%H4404>brickkiln<s%>.

There shall the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> thee; the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall cut thee <S%H3772>off<s%>, it shall eat thee <S%H398>up<s%> like the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%>: make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%>, make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H697>locusts<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H7402>merchants<s%> above the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> <S%H6584>spoileth<s%>, and flieth <S%H5774>away<s%>.

Thy <S%H4502>crowned<s%> are as the <S%H697>locusts<s%>, and thy <S%H2951>captains<s%> as the great <S%H1462>grasshoppers<s%>, which <S%H2583>camp<s%> in the <S%H1448>hedges<s%> in the <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, but when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>ariseth<s%> they flee <S%H5074>away<s%>, and their <S%H4725>place<s%> is not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> they are.

Thy <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5123>slumber<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: thy <S%H117>nobles<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the dust: thy <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H6335>scattered<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and no man <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> them.

There is no <S%H3545>healing<s%> of thy <S%H7667>bruise<s%>; thy <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous<s%>: all that <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>bruit<s%> of thee shall <S%H8628>clap<s%> the <S%H3709>hands<s%> over thee: for upon whom hath not thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>?
